body: Use the [Find a court or tribunal](https://www.find-court-tribunal.service.gov.uk) service to find out how to contact HMCTS about any other court and tribunal service.

components.html:
## Before you start

To use this service you'll need:

* a case reference number (if you have one)
* an email address HMCTS can use to reply to you

You can't use this service to send documents to HMCTS. Instead, respond to the email directly with your documents attached.

heading: Contact HMCTS
lede: Use this form to contact HMCTS about a probate or divorce application, or about a court claim for money
